snippet.title: Capsella The Lights of Lucern Cooperative Teaser
snippet.description:
Prepare to explore a new dimension of Action RPG with up to 4 friends local co-op.

Pre-order here: https://www.brightlocker.com/games/capsella/rewards

More information at https://www.braverysoftware.com

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/braverysoft
Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/braverysoft
Watch us on IndieDB! http://www.indiedb.com/games/capsella-the-lights-of-lucern
